credit_line: Gift of Doris Duke Charitable Foundation
title: Floor lamp
provenance:
Provenance:  Acquired for the Hollywood Wing of  Duke Farms , the addition of 1938, designed by  Thomas W. Lamb (1871-1942) for Doris Duke.  For a fuller history of the building, see Greg Herringshaw's history of the house in the justification for the six window shades from the same wing. (5969.2-7.2009)
It has been in the wing until sent for donation by the Doris Duke Charitable Foundation to CHNDM.
description: three-tiered conical lamp with spaces between the tiers to reveal light, on a reeded stem decending to a circular base
name: Floor lamp
